relation: CTS-500 TP is supported as a Video Remote Expert (VRE) kiosk only.
EX60, EX90 are supported. The EX series is not supported with Unified CM based Silent Monitor, RSM, Agent Greeting, or Whisper Announcement.
9951 and 9971 are supported. The 99xx series is not supported with RSM.
8941, 8945, 8961 is supported. The 89xx series is not supported with RSM.
7970 is not supported with Unified CM based Silent Monitor or RSM. 7975 only is supported with Agent Greeting or Whisper Announcement.
7961, 7962, and 7965 are supported. The 7960 model is not supported with Unified CM based Silent Monitor, RSM, or Agent Greeting and Whisper Announcement.
7941, 7942, and 7945 are supported. The 7940 model is not supported with Unified CM based Silent Monitor, RSM, Agent Greeting, or Whisper Announcement.
7921 and 7925 are supported. The 792x series is not supported with Agent Greeting or Whisper Announcement.
7911 is supported. The 791x series is not supported with Unified CCE based Silent Monitor, RSM, Agent Greeting, or Whisper Announcement.
Versions 7.0(x) and 8.6(x) are supported. Version 7.0(x) is not supported with Agent Greeting and Whisper Announcement. CIPC does not support Mobile Agents.
pageTitle: Unified CCE Software Compatibility Matrix for 9.0(x) - DocWiki
textBeforeTable: IP Phone Support CUCM 9.1 requires UCCE 9.0(3) or UCCE 9.0(2) with ES9. You cannot do a consult/single step transfer from an agent logged into the CTI OS Agent desktop on the Tandberg EX60 and EX90 phones. Disable Agent greeting on the CTI OS desktop for these phones. The CAD client and servers must all be at the same version. CAD clients and CAD server versions must be at the same major and minor release as the PG, CTI Server, and CTI OS Server and the CAD clients and CAD servers versions cannot be at a higher maintenance release than the PG, CTIS Server, and CTI OS Server versions. The PG, CTI Server, and CTI OS server versions must all be at the same version. Additionally, the PG, CTI Server, CTI OS Server, and CTI OS desktop versions cannot be higher than the Central Controller version. Unified CCMP 9.0(1), CRM for SAP will be certified after FCS of UCCE 9.0(1). This document will be revised to show support after testing has been completed. Whisper Announcement in a Parent/Child deployment requires at least Unified CCE 8.5(2), Unified CM 8.5(1) SU2, CTI OS Desktop 8.5(2), UCCX 8.5SU1 + ciscouccx.851SU1agentwhisper.cop.sgn, and a supported IP phone for local (non-mobile) agents. See IP Phone Support. Whisper Announcement for Mobile Agent requires at least Unified CCE 8.5(2), Unified CM 8.5(1) SU2, CTI OS Desktop 8.5(2), CVP 8.5(1) ES4, and a supported IP phone for local
